sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"飞机"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: aeroplane, airplane, aircraft, plane, jet, helicopter
means: aeroplane和airplane专指普通飞机，不包括helicopter(直升飞机)。aeroplane为英国英语的拼法。
aircraft ：常用作集体名词，也可指一架飞机，其含义包括直升飞机和飞艇等。
plane ：本义为"平面"，在航空专业里通常用aeroplane。plane较通俗用词。
jet ：指喷气式飞机，也用jet plane。

word_mean: 能在大气层中飞行的各种飞行器。

sentence.Network_en: The onslaught of orders should keep aircraft manufacturers busy for some time.
sentence.Network_cn: 纷至沓来的订单应该会让飞机制造商忙碌一段时间。

sentence.Network_en: Since its inception the company has produced 53 different aircraft designs.
sentence.Network_cn: 该公司自成立以来已经完成了53种不同样式飞行器的设计。

sentence.Network_en: A light aircraft crash-landed on a putting green yesterday.
sentence.Network_cn: 一架轻型飞机昨天在一个高尔夫球场的球洞区紧急降落了。

entry.def: An aircraft is a vehicle which can fly, for example an aeroplane or a helicopter.

example.ex: The return flight of the aircraft was delayed...
At least three military aircraft were destroyed.

auth_sentence.content: Last year, it acquired its first aircraft carrier.
auth_sentence.res_content: Last year, it acquired its first aircraft carrier.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Last year, it acquired its first aircraft carrier.

auth_sentence.content: Every...aircraft flying over Europe can be tracked by radar.
auth_sentence.res_content: Every...aircraft flying over Europe can be tracked by radar.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Every...aircraft flying over Europe can be tracked by radar.

stems_affixes.word_buile: air空气,充气→n.空气, 天空 v.使通风
air航空+craft工艺, 手艺→n.航行器
air航空+port港口,舱门→n.机场, 飞机降落场
air空气,充气→n.空气, 天空 v.使通风

Sentence.sentence: Maybe so, but someone managed to get that hand gun onto the aircraft or it couldn't have been there.
Maybe so, but someone managed to get that hand gun onto the aircraft or it couldn't have been there.

means.word_mean: 飞机, 航空器, 飞行器

sentences.en: All aircraft must fuel before a long flight.
sentences.cn: 所有飞机均须先加油方能作长途飞行。

jushi.english: He had piloted as many as a hundred aircraft without encountering one of these unique planes.
jushi.chinese: 他一生中驾驶过上百架飞机，可是从来未遇到过一架这样无与伦比的飞机。

jushi.english: The Air Force maintains many kinds of aircraft.
jushi.chinese: 空军装备了许多种飞行器。

jushi.english: I found three aircraft very far on the horizon.
jushi.chinese: 我发现三架飞机在遥远的天际。
